events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department for further review by the hiring managers and recruiters.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case and will reach out shortly to discuss the next steps of the recruitment process.
We completed the initial screening and found your skills and experience align well with the software developer role requirements. We will schedule a technical interview soon.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the technical interview. We appreciate your prompt response and enthusiasm for the role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 18th at 2 PM UTC. You will receive a calendar invite with video conferencing details shortly.
The technical interview was successfully completed. The interviewers were impressed with your problem-solving abilities and coding skills.
